analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0x6c2434014d06f8d5955a60d9d5221b45665c4746.sol:
	Contract MintFToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0x6c2434014d06f8d5955a60d9d5221b45665c4746.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0x6c2434014d06f8d5955a60d9d5221b45665c4746.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/28/0x6c2434014d06f8d5955a60d9d5221b45665c4746.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0x6c2434014d06f8d5955a60d9d5221b45665c4746.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
